mapper.select:
SELECT qr_code, is_need_clean, clean_remind_status, last_confirm_time,block_flag, create_time FROM gmair_machine.machine_filter_clean WHERE 1 = 1
AND qr_code = #{_parameter}
mapper.update:
UPDATE gmair_machine.machine_filter_clean
is_need_clean = #{isNeedClean},
clean_remind_status = #{cleanRemindStatus},
last_confirm_time = #{lastConfirmTime},
block_flag = #{blockFlag},
create_time= #{createAt},
qr_code = #{qrcode}
WHERE qr_code = #{qrcode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gmair_machine.machine_filter_clean(qr_code, is_need_clean, clean_remind_status, last_confirm_time,block_flag, create_time) VALUES(#{qrcode}, #{isNeedClean}, #{cleanRemindStatus}, #{lastConfirmTime}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
